mdRecord.dcterms:title: Hill-Carrillo Adobe, detail view
Hill-Carrillo House
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Hill, Daniel Antonio (American architect, 1797-1865) [work]
Wilson, Richard Guy [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Today the headquarters for the Santa Barbara Foundation. The house boasted glass windows, which Hill had imported from Boston. The adobe also had one of the first wooden floors in the city. -- http://www.independent.com/news/2010/oct/06/pioneer-past/ It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1986, and is a California Historical Landmark site (#721) as well. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hill-Carrillo_Adobe [work]
